holidays.title: Abet and Aid Punsters Day
holidays.description: A pun a day keeps the doctor away, so unleash your best (or worst) puns today!

holidays.title: Cook Something Bold and Pungent Day
holidays.description: Let your adventurous inner chef out and tickle your taste buds with weird and wonderful food!

holidays.title: International Day of Radiology
holidays.description: On November 8, join radiologists in raising awareness about the importance of radiography in healthcare.

holidays.title: National Ashley Day
holidays.description: Join us as we learn more about the history behind National Ashley Day!

holidays.title: ​National Cappuccino Day
holidays.description: Double espresso, steamed milk and foam. It’s amazing how these simple ingredients make us so happy!

holidays.title: National Dunce Day
holidays.description: Don your dunce cap and gear up for a fun day of learning.

holidays.title: National Harvey Wallbanger Day
holidays.description: Sit back, relax, and sip on your favorite refreshing alcoholic beverage today!

holidays.title: National Leon Day
holidays.description: Leons, it is time to embrace your inner lion and celebrate your namesake.

holidays.title: National Parents as Teachers Day
holidays.description: Teachers and parents are equally responsible for a child’s educational growth and development.

holidays.title: Talk Money Day
holidays.description: Wealth is quiet. Rich is loud. Poor is flashy. Learn more about money here today.

holidays.title: World Pianist Day
holidays.description: Time for pianists to play their hearts out this World Pianist Day.

holidays.title: World Radiography Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the birth of the ground-breaking technology of X-rays on World Radiography Day!

holidays.title: World Town Planning Day
holidays.description: Our lives are easier because of it, and our communities aren’t complete without it.

holidays.title: Benjamin Wadsworth’s Birthday
holidays.description: Young and steadily rising — this charismatic actor is one to look out for!

holidays.title: Bentley Hammington’s Birthday
holidays.description: Come along as we get to know more about the little star, Bentley Hammington.

holidays.title: Bobby Bowden’s Birthday
holidays.description: To one of the best coaches that American college football has ever seen, salud!

holidays.title: Bonnie Raitt’s Birthday
holidays.description: This Rock and Roll Hall of Famer continues to create her unique brand of music!

holidays.title: Damon Fizzy’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate this multi-talented, inspiring YouTuber as well as his career achievements.

holidays.title: DanTDM’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let's get to know the big-time YouTuber, DanTDM, a little more on his birthday.

holidays.title: David Muir’s Birthday
holidays.description: Here’s everything you need to know about one of the world’s most iconic journalists, David Muir.

holidays.title: Erica Mena’s Birthday
holidays.description: She's thriving in life and in her career. Learn more as we celebrate her birthday!

holidays.title: Gordon Ramsay’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this professional food critic, to be great you need to realize the greatness in yourself.

holidays.title: Hannah Rylee’s Birthday
holidays.description: Hannah Rylee has inspired hundreds of people, many of whom want to be like her.

holidays.title: Jonathan Wheeler’s Birthday
holidays.description: This Canadian streamer has 102,000 followers on Twitch and 213,000 subscribers on YouTube.

holidays.title: José Manuel López Castro’s Birthday
holidays.description: Castro is a famous world music singer who has already released several albums.

holidays.title: Justin McElroy’s Birthday
holidays.description: Nothing can stop Justin McElroy, the successful American podcaster, comedian, and former video game journalist.

holidays.title: Khia’s Birthday
holidays.description: Have you been keeping up with rapper Khia? If not, we have all the insights needed!

holidays.title: Lauren Alaina’s Birthday
holidays.description: This charming country singer got her big break when she featured on "American Idol."

holidays.title: Lisa Peachy’s Birthday
holidays.description: To underestimate her gaming skills would be playing yourself a bad hand.

holidays.title: Matilda Ramsay’s Birthday
holidays.description: She started at a young age and still dominates in her industry today.

holidays.title: Naz Norris’s Birthday
holidays.description: All Nazzy has to do is be herself; the top spot is hers for the taking!

holidays.title: Nick Mara’s Birthday
holidays.description: Nick Mara is a brilliant artist who came to excel in many disciplines.

holidays.title: Tech N9ne’s Birthday
holidays.description: Tech N9ne is a brilliant artist who grows stronger every day. Nothing can beat him!

holidays.title: Travis McElroy’s Birthday
holidays.description: Travis McElroy is unstoppable. He is always looking for the next challenge!
